abstract: Stocks gained after Sanofi-Aventis announced it would buy the health-care products company Chattem and Bucyrus International said it would buy the mining equipment division of Terex.
snippet: Stocks gained after Sanofi-Aventis announced it would buy the health-care products company Chattem and Bucyrus International said it would buy the mining equipment division of Terex.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose on Monday, erasing last week’s losses, as analysts recommended companies from Alcoa to Intel. Health care shares also surged after Congress delayed a new tax in the proposed industry overhaul.

headline.main: Markets Rebound on Assist by Optimistic Analysts
headline.print_headline: Markets Rebound on Assist by Optimistic Analysts
